data.title: KTC to redefine consumer finance through digital transformation
data.description: Among the upgrades planned for 2025 are customisation of offerings, addressing fraud and developing a secure e-service platform

data.title: Phillip Securities acquires RHB, boosting revenue 50%, offering 20 markets.
data.description: Phillip Securities Thailand has closed a major deal to acquire RHB Securities Thailand, strengthening its stock brokerage business. The merger is expected to boost revenue by more than 50% while expanding services and client base amid challenging conditions in Thailand's capital market.

data.title: Office rental rates in Silom-Sathorn-Rama IV area up in Q3
data.description: Office-building market in Q3 2024 driven by  significant increase in supply and  rise in leasing activity

data.title: Need for homes for elderly rises as Thailand becomes aged society
data.description: Demand for nursing homes and residences for the elderly has surged as Thailand has entered an aged society, according to results of a survey by the Real Estate Information Centre (REIC) released on Sunday.

data.title: TCG unveils plans to help SMEs convert NPLs to standard debt
data.description: State institution opens communication channel for these debtors to engage in discussions and find solutions

data.title: Majority of elderly housing projects located in Bangkok and its vicinity
data.description: REIC nationwide survey points to growing demand for elderly housing in urban and economic hubs

data.title: Bitcoin soars to $104,000, up 126% since January 1
data.description: The price of Bitcoin hit US$100,000 for the first time in history on Thursday, thanks to demand from Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), which has led to tightening of supply after Bitcoin’s fourth halving in April and Donald Trump's US election win.

data.title: Lao Bullion Bank CEO reveals shareholder structure as bank launches
data.description: Chanthone Sitthixay stresses that his family and the government of Lao PDR are the sole shareholders and that no Chinese financing is involved

data.title: MONO stocks under close watch by SET for suspected manipulation
data.description: Mono Next, whose trading symbol is MONO, put under trading restriction measure Level 1

data.title: Five booming businesses driving Phuket’s land prices sky high
data.description: Developer Sansiri plans to invest 25 billion baht in 27 new projects in the next five years

data.title: Thais shift to renting as property market booms in tourist cities
data.description: Thailand’s real estate market is seeing a shift as more people opt for renting due to economic challenges, high household debts and rising interest rates

data.title: Trump’s policy to drive growth of Thai property sector in 2025
data.description: Property consultant confident the expected tariffs on China will push foreign businesses to move their bases to Thailand

data.title: Foreigners take ownership of condos worth 18.571bn in 3rd quarter
data.description: During first nine months, 11,036 condo units were transferred to foreign buyers

data.title: Seacon targets housing for civil servants amid economic slowdown

data.title: How a Trump victory could impact your investment portfolio?
data.description: UOB Thailand’s shares insights on what a second-term Trump presidency might mean for investors.

data.title: Explainer: What the BOT board chairperson cannot do under the law

data.title: Bridgewise-Rakuten partnership will offer cutting-edge info to Japanese investors

data.title: SEC, SET stress goal of restoring confidence in Thai capital market

data.title: JKN risks SET delisting for delayed filing of Q1 financial statement
data.description: Shares of JKN Global Group are at risk of being delisted from the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) because of failure to submit a financial statement for the first quarter of 2024 within a specific time.

data.title: Pichai reveals why he thinks the Thai stock index won’t hit 2,000
data.description: Finance minister blames companies for focusing on dividends to shareholders instead of reinvesting
